tool_description: this api will help you to get all live information about climate
name: live climate
title: live climate

api_list.name: news
api_list.description: this has lots of category by website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate1.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
